text: Boston is a trick-taking card game played by 4 people. It is thought to have started in France in the 1770s.Oxford Dictionary of Card Games, David Parlett, p.27 - Oxford University Press The game is similar to Whist. It is a strategy game. Each game takes about 25 minutes to play. American Boston is a different way to play the game. It is for 4 players in two partnerships with 2 packs of 52 cards. ==References== ==Other websites== *the card game at thefreedictionary.com Category:Card games
